text:
Message 944 of 4024
No worries. I actually have that issue about 25% of the time on OFW. In general, since this all began, it seems tech has not been our friend
unfortunately.
I am open to a mutually agreed protocol for urgent or emergency situations. This was not one. But if there is one, we need a better way to
communicate.
Technically you can unblock me and we know I won’t use it because of the RO. But if AD has an issue at school (example) I could. What would you
suggest?
Sent:02/02/2024 at 08:54 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 09:32 AM)
Subject:Re: Sync Tonight
Message 945 of 4024
Hope you are ok with the investment decisions I’m making. I’ve been very deliberate since July and spend time on this while I am unemployed.
I trimmed back on losers I wanted to see rebound (ARK, AMD). I was being stubborn. I’m focused on stocks I believe are best for the next 6-12
months.
That said, we still have a good chunk of Tesla I’m not comfortable with. It’s not like a real stock. It behaves like a Musk popularity contest. Still tbd
there.
But loser sales have funded bills and should help offset capital gains we see as we transition to selling some of the winners. I think it’s a win-win
though?
I realize penning this, how I miss our intellectual connection. Between that and booty, we eliminated our most electric/satisfying connections. I
digress..
Please let me know if you have questions or concerns. I’d be happy to consider input or feedback if you want to consider a more conservative position
right now.
Including Vanguard as well as fyi..
Sent:02/02/2024 at 09:31 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 09:33 AM)
